about_the_game:
The idea of this game, I will add more missions and modes, and I will add more for the story of the game. Each mode has Unique places and characters. Remember, this game is developed by one person, do not expect it will be like big studio. I developed this game because I like video game. If you play this game, please finish all game. Do not just play first mission.

- Fear of the Past is a game about feeling remorse for a mistake or sin that you almost did but did not do.


- The game is first Person Camera.

- You are not fighter in game. you are Peaceful person, so try to escape from the stalkers who are trying to catch you. Also, Enemies are smart.

- Try to fix the puzzles.

- Try to escape the Mazes.

Remember: - Press 1 in keyboard / press button gamepad left if you want to make new save
- Press 2 in keyboard / press button gamepad Right if you want to delete new save

Some puzzles need you to break the wall or removing stuff, so hold mouse left or RB in gamepad to carry the stuffs
